Nerangs.ab: aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm zōhr bē nigerišn haōmauuaitīm gaōmauuaitīm haδānaēpatauuaitīm aṣ̌aiia uzdātąm tauua ahurāne ahurahe āb bē nigerišn xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe

"At aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm, he has to gaze at the zōhr (and continue with) haōmauuaitīm gaōmauuaitīm haδānaēpatauuaitīm aṣ̌aiia uzdātąm and at tauua ahurāne ahurahe, he has to gaze at the water (and continue with) xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe."
